titleStmt.title: Eustathia, or the constancie of Susanna containing the preservation of the godly, subversion of the wicked, precepts for the aged, instructions for youth, pleasure with profitte. Penned by R.R.G.
titleStmt.author: Roche, Robert, 1575 or 6-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Joseph Barnes, and are to be sold [by J. Broome, London] in Paules church-yarde at the signe of the Bible,
